goals__remit: NIS is one of the largest vertically integrated energy companies in Southeast Europe. Our principal activities are exploration, production and refining, sales and distribution of a broad range of petroleum products, as well as the implementation of energy projects. NIS goal is to become a recognizable leader of the Balkan region in its field of business activity, owing to the dynamics of sustainable development and efficiency increase, by showing a high level of social and environmental responsibility as well as contemporary standards of providing services to the clients.
position: Head of EU Liaison Office and Representative in Brussels
